summary: CROSSLEY, S-D SURVEYS, INC. is a marketing research company. The company is based in New York City and conducts surveys in the U.S. and around the world. For confidential support call the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline at 1-800-273-8255 or visit http://www.suicidepreventionlifeline.org/. For support on suicide matters call the Samaritans on 08457 90 90 or  visit a local Samaritan branch or click here.
